name.en: Economic Operators Identification and Registration system

description.en: This site allows to validate EORI numbers and provides access to the information related to Authorised Economic Operators (AEO). An EORI number is unique throughout the EU, assigned by a customs authority in a member state to economic operators (businesses) or persons.

access.guidanceOnLocatingIds: An EORI number must start with two uppercase letters (the ISO code of the country that granted the number) followed by maximum 15 alphanumeric characters
